Columns.Description: Value is OpsManager for all records in this table.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time that the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the Operations Manager management group for System Center Operations Manager agents.
Columns.Name: ManagementGroupName

Columns.Description: Unique GUID identifier for a computer.
Columns.Name: SourceComputerId

Columns.Description: Operation status description. Ccommon values include Warning Succeeded Failed Error.
Columns.Name: OperationStatus

Columns.Description: Name of a physical or virtual machine having membership with Log Analytics agent.
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: User friendly string that describes further details about the operation
Columns.Name: Detail

Columns.Description: Name of the area that produced the record.
Columns.Name: OperationCategory

Columns.Description: Name of the managed solution that produced the record. Can also include other sources such as RestAPI.
Columns.Name: Solution

Columns.Description: Reference URL for additional contextual information.
Columns.Name: HelpLink

Columns.Description: Operation ID. Can be a GUID or string.
Columns.Name: OperationKey

Columns.Description: GUID that is shared with telemetry belonging to the same uber action.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
